email.subject: Certificate Upload Error Notification
email.body:
Dear {email},

We have completed the processing of your bulk certification import for the file: ({file_name}). However, we encountered issues with following entries.

{failed_users}

Please review the certificate information and resubmit the updated information at your earliest convenience.

If you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our support team.

Best regards,

{company_name} Support Team

Phone: {company_phone}

Email: {company_email}
